named-native-query.name: ArticleStatistique.allArticleStatistiqueClients
named-native-query.query: SELECT rownum, stat.* FROM ( SELECT "GEO_ORDLIG"."ART_REF", "GEO_CLIENT"."CLI_CODE", "GEO_CLIENT"."RAISOC", "GEO_CLIENT"."ZIP", "GEO_CLIENT"."VILLE" , "GEO_ORDLIG"."EXP_NB_COL", "GEO_ORDLIG"."EXP_PDS_NET", "GEO_ORDRE"."NORDRE" FROM "GEO_ORDLIG", "GEO_ORDRE", "GEO_CLIENT" WHERE ( "GEO_ORDLIG"."ORD_REF" = "GEO_ORDRE"."ORD_REF" ) and ( "GEO_CLIENT"."CLI_REF" = "GEO_ORDRE"."CLI_REF" ) and ( ( geo_ordlig.art_ref = :arg_art_ref ) AND ( geo_ordre.soc_code = :arg_soc_code ) AND ( geo_ordre.depdatp between :arg_date_min and :arg_date_max ) ) ORDER BY "GEO_ORDLIG"."ART_REF", "GEO_CLIENT"."CLI_CODE", "GEO_CLIENT"."RAISOC", "GEO_CLIENT"."ZIP", "GEO_CLIENT"."VILLE" ) stat

named-native-query.name: ArticleStatistique.allArticleStatistiqueFournisseurs
named-native-query.query: SELECT rownum, stat.* FROM ( SELECT sum(geo_ordlig.exp_nb_col) as exp_nb_col, sum(geo_ordlig.exp_pds_net) as exp_pds_net, count(geo_ordre.ord_ref) as nb_ordre, "GEO_ORDLIG"."ART_REF" , "GEO_FOURNI"."FOU_CODE" , "GEO_FOURNI"."RAISOC" , "GEO_FOURNI"."ZIP" , "GEO_FOURNI"."VILLE" , "GEO_ORDRE"."NORDRE" FROM "GEO_FOURNI", "GEO_ORDLIG", "GEO_ORDRE" WHERE ( "GEO_FOURNI"."FOU_CODE" = "GEO_ORDLIG"."FOU_CODE" ) and ( "GEO_ORDLIG"."ORD_REF" = "GEO_ORDRE"."ORD_REF" ) and ( ( geo_ordlig.art_ref = :arg_art_ref ) and ( geo_ordre.soc_code = :arg_soc_code ) and ( geo_ordre.depdatp between :arg_date_min and :arg_date_max ) ) GROUP BY "GEO_FOURNI"."FOU_CODE", "GEO_FOURNI"."RAISOC", "GEO_FOURNI"."ZIP", "GEO_FOURNI"."VILLE" , "GEO_ORDLIG"."ART_REF", "GEO_ORDRE"."NORDRE" ) stat
